critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of joy and hope for Native American communities by addressing past mistreatment and promoting self-determination and prosperity. It also seeks to instill a sense of trust and respect through government-to-government relationships. There might be a hint of sadness when acknowledging the history of mistreatment, but the overall tone is forward-looking and positive. There is no intention to convey anger, fear, disgust, or surprise.
